1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Attribute getters: Extract attribute from use of relmap.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get
7  ( -- * Datatype
8    RopGet,
9  
10    -- * Basic
11    getTag, getTags,
12    getOption, getMaybe,
13    getSwitch, getWord,
14  
15    -- * Tree
16    getTree, getTrees,
17    getWordTrees,
18    getTreesByColon,
19  
20    -- * Relmap
21    getRelmap, getOptRelmap,
22  
23    -- * Term
24    getTerm, getTerm2, getTermOpt,
25    getTerms, getSignedTerms, getTermsCo,
26    getTermPairs, getTermsColon,
27    getTermTrees,
28  ) where
29
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax           as S
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data             as D
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core             as C
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Term    as Op
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message as Msg
36
37
38-- ----------------------  Datatype
39
40type RopGet c a
41    = C.Intmed c    -- ^ Use of relmap operator
42    -> String       -- ^ Name of keyword, e.g., @\"-term\"@
43    -> B.Ab a       -- ^ Attribute of relmap
44
45lookupTree :: String -> C.Intmed c -> Maybe [S.TTree]
46lookupTree = lookupAttr S.AttrNormal
47
48lookupAttr :: (String -> S.AttrName) -> String -> C.Intmed c -> Maybe [S.TTree]
49lookupAttr c ('-' : name) = S.paraLookupSingle (c name) . getPara
50lookupAttr _ _ = B.bug "lookupAttr"
51
52getAbortable :: ([S.TTree] -> B.Ab b) -> RopGet c b
53getAbortable f med name =
54    do trees <- getTrees med name
55       Msg.abAttrTrees trees $ f trees
56
57getAbortableOption :: b -> ([S.TTree] -> B.Ab b) -> RopGet c b
58getAbortableOption y f med name =
59    do m <- getMaybe getTrees med name
60       case m of
61         Nothing    -> Right y
62         Just trees -> Msg.abAttrTrees trees $ f trees
63
64
65-- ----------------------  Basic
66
67-- | Get relmap parameter.
68getPara :: C.Intmed c -> S.AttrPara
69getPara = C.lexAttr . C.medLexmap
70
71getTag :: C.Intmed c -> String -> Bool
72getTag med tag = tag `elem` getTags med
73
74-- | Get usage tags.
75getTags :: C.Intmed c -> [String]
76getTags = S.paraTags . getPara
77
78-- | Get optional parameter with default value.
79getOption :: a -> RopGet c a -> RopGet c a
80getOption y get med name =
81    case lookupTree name med of
82      Nothing -> Right y
83      Just _  -> get med name
84
85-- | Get parameter whenever given or not.
86getMaybe :: RopGet c a -> RopGet c (Maybe a)
87getMaybe get med name =
88    case lookupTree name med of
89      Nothing -> Right Nothing
90      Just _  -> Right . Just =<< get med name
91
92-- | Get @True@ when attribute is given, @False@ otherwise.
93getSwitch :: C.Intmed c -> String -> B.Ab Bool
94getSwitch med name = getAbortableOption False get med name where
95    get [] = Right True
96    get _  = Msg.unexpAttr $ "Just type only " ++ name
97
98-- | Get word from named attribute.
99--
100--   > consXxx :: RopCons c
101--   > consXxx med = do
102--   >   sign <- getWord med "-sign"
103--   >   ...
104getWord :: RopGet c String
105getWord = getAbortable get where
106    get [S.TextLeaf _ _ s] = Right s
107    get _ = Msg.unexpAttr "Require one word"
108
109
110-- ----------------------  Tree
111
112-- | Get trees as single tree.
113getTree :: RopGet c S.TTree
114getTree med name =
115    do trees <- getTrees med name
116       Right $ S.ttreeGroup trees
117
118-- | Get trees from parameter.
119getTrees :: RopGet c [S.TTree]
120getTrees med name =
121    case lookupTree name med of
122      Just trees -> Right trees
123      Nothing    -> Msg.noAttr name
124
125getWordTrees :: RopGet c [B.Named S.TTree]
126getWordTrees med name =
127    case lookupTree name med of
128      Just trees -> wordTrees trees
129      Nothing    -> Msg.noAttr name
130
131wordTrees :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [B.Named S.TTree]
132wordTrees []  = Right []
133wordTrees [_] = Msg.unexpAttr "Require word and tree"
134wordTrees (w : tree : xs) =
135    do w'  <- word w
136       xs' <- wordTrees xs
137       Right $ (w', tree) : xs'
138
139word :: S.TTree -> B.Ab String
140word (S.TextLeaf _ _ w) = Right w
141word _ = Msg.unexpAttr "Require one word"
142
143getTreesByColon :: RopGet c [[S.TTree]]
144getTreesByColon med name =
145    do trees <- getTrees med name
146       Right $ B.omit null $ S.divideTreesByColon trees
147
148
149-- ----------------------  Relmap
150
151-- | Get a relmap from operator use.
152--
153--   > consMeet :: (Ord c) => RopCons c
154--   > consMeet med = do
155--   >   m <- getRelmap med "-relmap"
156--   >   Right $ relmapMeet med m
157getRelmap :: C.Intmed c -> String -> B.Ab (C.Relmap c)
158getRelmap med name =
159    case lookup name $ C.medSubmap med of
160      Nothing -> Msg.reqRelmap 1
161      Just m  -> Right m
162
163getOptRelmap :: C.Relmap c -> C.Intmed c -> String -> B.Ab (C.Relmap c)
164getOptRelmap rmap0 med = B.right rmap0 . getRelmap med
165
166
167-- ----------------------  Term
168
169-- | Get a term name from named attribute.
170getTerm :: RopGet c S.TermName
171getTerm = getAbortable get where
172    get [x] = Op.termName x
173    get _   = Msg.unexpAttr "Require one term"
174
175getTerm2 :: RopGet c (S.TermName, S.TermName)
176getTerm2 med n =
177    do terms <- getTerms med n
178       case terms of
179         [x,y] -> Right (x, y)
180         _     -> Msg.unexpAttr "Require two term"
181
182getTermOpt :: RopGet c (Maybe S.TermName)
183getTermOpt = getMaybe getTerm
184
185-- | Get list of term names from named attribute.
186getTerms :: RopGet c [S.TermName]
187getTerms = getAbortable Op.termNames
188
189getSignedTerms :: RopGet c [S.SignedTermName]
190getSignedTerms = getAbortable Op.signedTermNames
191
192-- | Get term names and complement sign (@~@) .
193getTermsCo :: RopGet c (Bool, [S.TermName])
194getTermsCo = getAbortable Op.termNamesCo
195
196-- | Get list of term-name pairs from named attribute.
197getTermPairs :: RopGet c [S.TermName2]
198getTermPairs = getAbortable Op.termNamePairs
199
200getTermsColon :: RopGet c [[S.TermName]]
201getTermsColon = getAbortable Op.termNamesColon
202
203getTermTrees :: RopGet c [B.Named S.TTree]
204getTermTrees = getAbortable D.treesToTerms1
